com.tiberiuslabs.BattleChess.GameEngine

Class Init

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiberiuslabs.BattleChess.GameEngine.Init

  • public class Init
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for generating the initial game information
    Author:
    Amandeep Gill

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<Position> cities
      An immutable set of pos describing the location of all six cities
      static java.util.Map<Position,Unit> defaultPositions
      An immutable mapping from pos -> unit, used to setup the initial board state
      static java.util.Map<Position,java.util.List<Position>> moveAdjacencies
      An immutable mapping of current pos -> adjacent pos, used to bypass calculation of adjacencies at runtime
      static java.util.Map<Position,Color> tileColors
      An immutable mapping of pos -> tile color, used to verify that players do not have more than one Assassin on each of the tile colors

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Init() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Map<Position,Unit> initBoard()
      Constructs a map that has all 91 tile positions mapped to the unit that is at that tile or null if the tile is empty

    • Method Detail

      • initBoard

        public static java.util.Map<Position,Unit> initBoard()
        Constructs a map that has all 91 tile positions mapped to the unit that is at that tile or null if the tile is empty
        Returns:
        a pos -> unit map with unit == null representing empty tiles
